author: Special Correspondent
text:
The water level in the Mettur Dam stood at 72.39 feet on Friday against its full level of 120 feet.

The storage level of the dam was 34.788 tmc against its full capacity of 93.470 tmc. The dam was receiving an inflow of 116 cusecs. About 5,000 cusecs of water is being released from the dam for farm activities in Cauvery Delta districts.
title: Mettur Dam level
